messages.subject: chiro
messages.msgSnippet: I too have been seeing a chiropractor for a looooong time. I go as often as my schedule allows, I try to go 2x/wk. Luckily he s a friend of ours, so he allows
messages.messageBody:
I too have been seeing a chiropractor for a looooong time. I go as often as
my schedule allows, I try to go 2x/wk. Luckily he's a friend of ours, so he
allows me to be flexible with my visits. I think the advantages of
chiropractic care are enourmous. I try to go even when I'm not in pain, so
that I can still receive the benefits of a better immune system, etc. My
children have all been adjusted from time to time also. He confirms what has
already been stated here, that simply being born is one of the most
traumatic things that can happen to the spinal cord. I would encorage
everyone, child or adult, in pain or not to visit a chiropractor. IMO it can
only make things better.
Amy
